summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.1°C) and outside temperature (up 2.4°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 1.9 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 3816 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1765 m), light levels (up 9414 lux), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 181.1m lower than yesterday, 670.3m lower than the past week, 1765.4m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 713m and a peak of 1594m, averaging 885.8m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and winds will be practically absent. Moderate rainfall, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and periods of sunshine are expected. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
